publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3470 Jim Mather: Return of William Wallace Letter, “The Safe Conduct”, to Scotland—That the Parliament believes that the letter, carried by Sir William Wallace from the King of France and known as “The Safe Conduct”, guaranteeing his safe passage and supporting his bid for an audience with the Pope, which was taken from him when he was betrayed, should be held in Scotland where it should be available to the public and calls on the National Museums of Scotland, the National Library of Scotland and the National Archives of Scotland to seek the letter’s permanent return to Scotland from the National Archives at Kew for display in Scotland.

S2M-3470 Return of William Wallace Letter, "The Safe Conduct", to Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Campbell Martin*, Ms Sandra White*, Mr John Swinney*, Richard Lochhead*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Rob Gibson*, Linda Fabiani*, Fergus Ewing*, Bruce Crawford*, Brian Adam*, Nora Radcliffe*, Mr Andrew Welsh*, Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Christine Grahame*, Tricia Marwick*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Fiona Hyslop*, Eleanor Scott*, Mr Stewart Maxwell*

S2M-3470 Jim Mather: Return of William Wallace Letter, "The Safe Conduct", to Scotland—That the Parliament believes that the letter, carried by Sir William Wallace from the King of France and known as “The Safe Conduct”, guaranteeing his safe passage and supporting his bid for an audience with the Pope, which was taken from him when he was betrayed, should be held in Scotland where it should be available to the public and calls on the National Museums of Scotland, the National Library of Scotland and the National Archives of Scotland to seek the letter’s permanent return to Scotland from the National Archives at Kew for display in Scotland. Supported by: Campbell Martin, Ms Sandra White, Mr John Swinney, Richard Lochhead, Mr Adam Ingram, Rob Gibson, Linda Fabiani, Fergus Ewing, Bruce Crawford, Brian Adam, Nora Radcliffe, Mr Andrew Welsh, Mr Kenny MacAskill, Christine Grahame, Tricia Marwick, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Roseanna Cunningham, Fiona Hyslop, Eleanor Scott, Mr Stewart Maxwell, Robin Harper*
S2M-3470 Return of William Wallace Letter, "The Safe Conduct", to Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mr Bruce McFee*
S2M-3470 Return of William Wallace Letter, "The Safe Conduct", to Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Dennis Canavan*, Michael Matheson*, Alex Neil*
S2M-3470 Return of William Wallace Letter, "The Safe Conduct", to Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3470 Return of William Wallace Letter, "The Safe Conduct", to Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Mrs Margaret Ewing*
S2M-3470 Return of William Wallace Letter, “The Safe Conduct”, to Scotland (lodged on 26 October 2005) Shiona Baird* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
